result.arabic_text: لَيۡلَةُ ٱلۡقَدۡرِ خَيۡرٞ مِّنۡ أَلۡفِ شَهۡرٖ
result.translation: Ijoro ry’iteka nta ngere, ni ijoro iciza gikozwe muri ryo, gisumba mu ndishi iciza gikozwe mu mezi igihumbi atagiramwo iryo joro[1].
result.footnotes: [1] Iyo ni impano, Imana Allah Yageneye gusa abantu barungikiwe Intumwa Muhamadi (nyakugira amahoro n’impuhwe z’Imana Allah).
